product_name: Levi's 510 Skinny-Fit Commuter Bike Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The slimmest-fitting pants in the Levi's line-up, the men's Levi's 510 Skinny-Fit Commuter Bike Pants also offer stretch and ride-friendly features, so you're comfortable on the bike and off. Stretch midweight denim comfortably moves with you, whether you're riding or strolling through the city. Water-resistant and dirt-repellent Schoeller NanoSphere(R) protective finish helps fend off light rain, mud and road grit. Odor-resistant finish. U-lock holster is integrated with back waistband to make it easy to carry your lock as you ride. Rolling up pant cuffs exposes 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective tape, which helps boost your visibility to motorists. Slightly higher rise in back adds coverage on the saddle. Levi's 510 Skinny-Fit Commuter Bike Pants for men feature classic 5-pocket jeans styling. Closeout.
short_description: The slimmest-fitting pants in the Levi's line-up, the men's Levi's 510 Skinny-Fit Commuter Bike Pants also offer stretch and ride-friendly features, so you're comfortable on the bike and off.
